DataElement.preferredName: Patient Missed Dose Decision Not To Take Reason Data Unknown Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A single character text field to indicate if the patient missed doses for the reason of decided not to take.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Missed Dose Decision Not To Take Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dose of medicine that was not taken at the prescribed dosing interval._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A position, opinion, or judgment reached on an issue under consideration._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._As pertains to a medication: ingest, inhale, instill, or inject._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
